example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 意大利人)) (VP (VP (VV 身处) (LCP-OBJ (NP (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 欧元)) (VP (ADVP (AD 即将)) (VP (VV 启动)))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 历史) (NN 变革))) (LC 之中))) (PU ，) (VP (VC 是) (VP (VV 要) (VP (VP (DVP (VP (VA 悄悄)) (DEV 地)) (VP (VV 感受) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (PN 它)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 到来))))) (PU ，) (VP (DVP (ADVP (AD 逐步)) (DEV 地)) (PP (P 与) (NP (PN 它))) (VP (VV 共处))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 直)) (VP (VV 到) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 最后)) (ADVP (AD 完全)) (VP (VV 接纳) (NP-OBJ (PN 它))))))))))))
